name: EnergyX
description:
This is an educational game aimed for school students to help in understanding about household energy. The objective of this game to make the players learn about energy conservation at home and ways to save the energy it.This game is under development and the feedback are welcomed.

It is also recommended to play with people of all ages.

Note: After playing this game for the study purpose, please fill up the questionnaire in the given link below

https://forms.gle/ogv9oUHsA3ArRfgu7
